action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse (for himself and Mr. Ciscomani) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend authorization of the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Drought Preparedness Act.

subsection.text: Section 104(c) of the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991 (43 U.S.C. 2214(c)) is amended by striking 2022 and inserting 2028.
Section 301 of the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991 (43 U.S.C. 2241) is amended by striking 2022 and inserting 2028.
